title: I Still Haven't Recieved The Anniversary Gifts
body: I believe I am within the paremeters for the gift as the last game I played before the post was mad was August 7th. Previous to that was August 3rd. I haven't gotten the Icon, Kayle, or Riot Kayle.

replies.body:
We did miss a few players, sorry about that. If you reach out in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), we'll be able to take care of this for you.

Let me know if you have any questions.
